name: Broad ScoreKeeper
description:
A simple yet powerful app for keeping track of people’s score/points. Wonderful for card games or any activity where points matter. Check out the screen shots to see how this app can help you and your friends have more fun.

Features
- One point mode (easily add or subtract one point)
- Quickly save and load player’s scores
- Sort the player list alphabetically, by score or in a custom way

Thanks to Réka Haraszti, Laura Kriener, Steven Luo, and Alec Nelson for language localizations.
